title: Installation tasks (GCP)
content:
This section contains all the mandatory and optional tasks to install the suite in a GCP environment.

  • Activate Docker Hub account
  • Prepare GCP project and roles
  • Create Virtual Private Cloud
  • Build Kubernetes cluster
  • Prepare persistent volumes for ESM on GCP
  • Configure bastion node
  • Download installation packages
  • Subscribe to Cloud Filestore
  • CreateÂ external databases
    • (Optional) Install and configure Vertica database
  • Download and upload container images to a registry
  • Deploy bootstrap
  • Select the deployment configuration
  • Check and download the container images
  • Deploy the infrastructure services
  • Configure GCP external application load balancer
  • (Optional) Configure GCP internal application load balancer
